item.title: Using Rust to generate Kubernetes CRD
item.description: For the first time, I chose Rust to solve a problem. Until this, I’ve been trying to use Rust to learn the language and to rewrite existing code. But, this problem led me to Rust because my other tools wouldn’t cut it. The question was how to represent oneof fields in Kubernetes Custom Resource Definitions (CRDs). CRDs use OpenAPI schema and the YAML that results can be challenging to grok.
